# Change Request Template

## Change Overview

**Change ID:** [Auto-generated or assigned by Change Coordinator]  
**Requestor:** [Name and team]  
**Date Submitted:** [YYYY-MM-DD]  
**Target Implementation Date:** [YYYY-MM-DD]  
**Priority:** [Low / Medium / High / Critical]

---

## Change Details

### Summary
[Brief 1-2 sentence description of what is changing]

### Type of Change
- [ ] Infrastructure change
- [ ] Application deployment
- [ ] Configuration change
- [ ] Security patch
- [ ] Database migration
- [ ] Feature release
- [ ] Rollback
- [ ] Other: _______________

### Reason for Change
[Why is this change needed? Link to issue, feature request, or incident if applicable]

### Systems Affected
[List systems, services, or applications impacted by this change]

---

## Risk Assessment

### Risk Level
- [ ] Low Risk (minimal impact, easily reversible)
- [ ] Medium Risk (moderate impact, rollback available)
- [ ] High Risk (significant impact, complex rollback)
- [ ] Emergency (critical fix, potential for urgent rollback)

### Potential Impact
[Describe potential impact on users, systems, or business processes]

### Rollback Plan
[Describe how to revert this change if issues occur]

---

## Testing & Validation

### Pre-Production Testing Completed
- [ ] Unit tests pass
- [ ] Integration tests pass
- [ ] QA sign-off obtained
- [ ] Staging/UAT validation complete
- [ ] Performance testing (if applicable)
- [ ] Security scan (if applicable)

### Validation Criteria
[How will you verify the change was successful in production?]

---

## Approvals

### Required Approvals
- [ ] Change Coordinator
- [ ] Engineering Lead
- [ ] Project Manager
- [ ] Product Manager (if feature-related)
- [ ] QA (if quality-related)
- [ ] Security Team (if security-related)

### CAB Review
- [ ] Scheduled for CAB: [Date]
- [ ] CAB Decision: [Approved / Rejected / Deferred / Emergency Exception]
- [ ] CAB Notes: [Summary of discussion and decision rationale]

---

## Communication Plan

### Stakeholders to Notify
[List teams, stakeholders, or customers who need to be informed]

### Communication Timeline
- [ ] Advance notice sent (at least 3 days before)
- [ ] Day-of notification sent
- [ ] Post-change confirmation sent

### Maintenance Window
[If downtime is required, specify maintenance window]

- [ ] Monitoring shows normal metrics
- [ ] No error spikes detected
- [ ] User-facing functionality verified
